title: American writers of the 1920's have often been ...

content.question: American writers of the 1920’s have often been called the “lost generation” because they

choices.label: found it difficult to get their work published
were disillusioned with the course of American life
failed to achieve fame in their lifetimes
were politically radical in a conservative era
preferred to write for a European rather than an American audience

content.answer: were disillusioned with the course of American life

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
